title: How a Dollar General Employee Went Viral on TikTok
description: Mary Gundel loved managing a store in Tampa, Fla. But when she detailed its challenges on social media, the company — and fellow employees — took notice.
dc:creator: Michael Corkery
media:credit: Todd Anderson for The New York Times
media:description: Mary Gundel, who managed a Dollar General in Tampa, Fla., created the hashtag #PutInATicket because, she said, that was the company’s response to serious store issues.
